amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike subsection (b) of section 9015 regarding the waiver used by the Secretary of Defense with respect to providing funds to Pakistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike subsection (b) of section 9015 regarding the waiver used by the Secretary of Defense with respect to Pakistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 318 (Roll no. 344).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
